title: Examining non-performing loans on corporate financial sustainability: Evidence from Indonesia
content:
Publication date: December 2023

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 6

Author(s): Anna Sofia Atichasari, Aisyah Ratnasari, Umi Kulsum, Heri Sapari Kahpi, Septantri Shinta Wulandari, Asep Marfu
